item.description:
Trip's Coordinator: Dwight Jarrat ( djarrat@hotmail.com )

EVENT: Dinner at a restaurant in Newton Corner, followed by a swing
dance at the St. James Armenian Cultural Center in Watertown. There
is a free beginner's lesson from 8-9 pm and the dance is from 9-12 pm.
The featured band is Eight To The Bar.
Meet: 6:00 pm at the restaurant.
RSVP: Required by March 12, Restaurant location will be provided when
you RSVP.
Get swing dance infor. at http://www.bostonswin...
Cost: money for dinner, $15 for the dance + $5 for non-members
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to Dwight at djarrat@hotmail.com to make arrangements for meeting

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Dinner and Swing Dance
